name: 陳柏壽
objective: 現今社會中的經濟活動愈來愈錯綜，人與人之間的經濟關係也愈來愈複雜，但無非都是為求經濟問題的解決。如何將有限的資源在諸多可行的方法中，選擇最有利、最能發揮滿足慾望的效果，乃是身為「經濟人」的萬物之靈所努力的目標。本課程提供學習者分析經濟現象的工具，掌握經濟發展的脈動，以便在現代經濟社會中能夠心無旁鶩而心想事成。This objective of the course is to let students understand economic theory and how to use these theories to analyze the economic situations in the real world.
schedule: Ch1：Introduction (1 wk) Definition、Circular flow model、Economic Categories Supplement：Opportunity Cost and it’s application(2 wks) Scarcity、Opportunity Cost、Production Possibility Frontier、Competitive advantage、 Ch2：Supply and Demand：Practice (2~3 wks) Demand、Supply 、Market Equilibrium、Price Control and Applications Ch3：Elasticity (2~3 wks) Calculating Price Elasticity of Demand、Determinants 、Total Revenue( Total Expenditure)、and Applications Ch4：Consumer Choice and Demand (2~3 wks) Utility Theory、Maximizing Utility、Consumer Equilibrium and the law of Demand Ch5：Production and Costs(2~3 wks) The Firm’s Objective：Maximizing Profit、Economic Profit、Production Function、Cost Function、Economic Scale Ch6：Perfect Competition (1~2 wks) Characters、Short-run Equilibrium 、Long-run Equilibrium Ch7：Monopoly (1~2 wks) Characters、Short-run Equilibrium 、Long-run Equilibrium、Compare the markets of Perfect Competition and Monopoly Ch8：Factor Markets and Labor Markets (1~2 wks) The Supply and Demand of Factor Markets、Labor Markets
scorePolicy: 平時(筆記、出席、態度)40%;期中考30%;期末30%,曠課一節扣學期成績1分,遲到、事假、病假1節扣學期成績0.5分。
